mapper.sql: SELECT n.note_id, n.note, n.note_date, n.is_public, n.username, nt.note_type_id, nt.name, nt.description FROM note AS n JOIN note_type AS nt ON nt.note_type_id = n.note_type_id
mapper.select: JOIN inventory_note AS iv ON iv.note_id = n.note_id WHERE iv.inventory_id = #{inventory_id} AND n.active ORDER BY note_date DESC
JOIN well_note AS wn ON wn.note_id = n.note_id WHERE wn.well_id = #{well_id} AND n.active ORDER BY note_date DESC
